author: Nate Church
title: Malaysian Government Advises Women Not to Nag Husbands During Lockdown
description: A government advisory in Malaysia is facing widespread backlash after instructing women to not nag their husbands during quarantine.
content:
A government advisory in Malaysia is facing widespread backlash after instructing women to dress up, wear makeup, and not nag their husbands during quarantine.
In the wake of the southeast Asian country’s lockdown, Malaysia’s Ministry for Women, Family and C… [+1866 chars]
